title: Moderate-speed city driving at night with clear skies.
caption: The ego vehicle is driving straight on a city street at night, with moderate traffic and clear skies.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 1 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNight). The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed (average speed â‰ˆ 5.9 m/s). There are 10 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The road is a two-lane city street with a crosswalk and a traffic light. There are several parked cars on the side of the road, and a few cars driving in the opposite direction. The weather is clear and the visibility is good. The traffic light is green, and there are no pedestrians or obstacles in the immediate vicinity of the ego vehicle.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving straight at a moderate speed because it has detected a green traffic light ahead. It is maintaining a safe distance from the parked cars on the side of the road and is prepared to slow down or stop if necessary. The driver is paying attention to the traffic situation and is ready to react to any potential risks, such as sudden braking or merging traffic. The clear night skies and the well-lit street provide good visibility for the driver to navigate safely.
